javascript_client_setup.initialization_code: const medicalAI = new AthenAIClient('https://7fw9i838ml6e89-19123-2kbevou0smub53klr189.proxy.runpod.net', { defaultOrgId: 'your_hospital_name', debug: true });
javascript_client_setup.test_connection: medicalAI.testConnection().then(result => console.log('Health Check:', result)).catch(error => console.error('Connection Failed:', error));

requests_example.query_example: import requests; response = requests.post('https://7fw9i838ml6e89-19123-2kbevou0smub53klr189.proxy.runpod.net/query', json={'question': 'What is appendectomy?', 'org_id': 'your_hospital_name', 'k': 3}); print(response.json())

usage_examples.curl_query: curl -X POST 'https://7fw9i838ml6e89-19123-2kbevou0smub53klr189.proxy.runpod.net/query' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"question": "What are the steps in laparoscopic surgery?", "org_id": "your_hospital_name", "k": 3}'

javascript_fetch.query: fetch('https://7fw9i838ml6e89-19123-2kbevou0smub53klr189.proxy.runpod.net/query', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ question: 'What is appendectomy?', org_id: 'your_hospital_name', k: 3 }) }).then(r => r.json()).then(data => console.log(data));
